Possible Causes: Server-side exception or error in the application logic.
Misconfiguration of the server or application settings.

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: The server returned a 500 Internal Server Error when accessing the '/api/data' endpoint, indicating an unexpected condition on the server side.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: Users or clients attempting to access the '/api/data' endpoint will receive an error, potentially leading to a degraded user experience or loss of functionality.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: This issue could be related to recent changes in the application code, server configuration, or database performance.
